data.name: Draconite
data.description:
Prepare yourself and gear up by handpicking and assembling an arsenal of weapons from various rifle components that can be unlocked and combined after finishing levels.
Fight back and defend your Draconite against the Kayoo, an ancient horde of golems you awoke and whose sole goal is to find and destroy the crystals.
Find and raise your pet dragons to help your progress across the different levels and worlds in your adventure.

changelog.change_log:
Ho ho ho! Christmas is here!

Patch note :

Added
- Added a Christmas event which changes the hub and the hub's music
- Added Christmas decorations on the player's platform
- Added a new snowman bobblehead
- Added new Christmas grenades

Fixed
- Fixed the pumpkin head mannequins being visible outside of Halloween

Trick or treat! Halloween is near!
The new Halloween update is here!

Patch note :

Added
- Added an Halloween event which changes the hub and the hub's music
- Added Halloween decorations on the player's platform
- Added a new bat bobblehead
- Added pause menu activation when headset enter sleep mode to prevent the game from resuming instantly
- Added crystal hit sound feedback when it takes damage
- Added possibility to shred any blocks

Changed
- UIs text now have a small drop shadow to help with readability
- UIs have been resized to better fit on screen when looking forward
- Reduced shredder sound
- Weapons destruction is quicker when falling off platform

Fixed
- Fixed laser weapon bugging when fired on a dying enemy
- Fixed leaderboards loading time
- Fixed blocks disappearing when connecting to one another which caused a crash
- Fixed sound desync on some UIs
- Fixed typos
- Fixed object cards animation on unlocked elements
- Fixed settings toggle switching out when opening the settings for the first time
- Fixed UI alignment
- Fixed world change sound playing when returning from a level
- Fixed Rock Crab damage color
- Fixed weapon not shooting when starting a level
- Fixed weapons activating if destroyed during intro

Hey everyone! Finally, a couple months after its announcement, the Draconite : Defrost Update is available right now!

Patch note :

Added
- A world map menu
- 4 new maps each with a regular and Alternative rift
- A new Dev rift (the remaining dev rift will be released afterward, they needed fine tuning)
- 3 new enemies
- A new cannon along with its Dev pack skin
- Various sound boxes utils which change your weapon's sound to fun and lighthearted sounds
- Added hit sounds on monsters

Fixed
- Fixed an issue with the menu pointer rendering
- Fixed objects not positionning correctly when force grabbing
- Fixed level start screen not displaying correctly on certain conditions
- Fixed Score Board glitching out the numbers on certain Dev rifts
- Fixed some enemies not having the correct color when hit
- Fixed leaderboards displaying too much info, resulting in performance drops
- Fixed Techno Cannon's collisions causing it to activate multiple time
- Fixed various typos
- Fixed aim laser on Grenade Launcher's Dev skin not showing the arc trajectory
- Fixed Marks counting
- Fixed issue with capsules taking non-capsule slots when reloading a gun

Balancing
- Reduced Magic Ball charging time

Add button on locked developpers rift to clarify
Add version number in settings
